item.title: How to Navigate the Microsoft Sticky Notes App Settings (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Switch Between Windows How to Cycle Forward Through All Windows How to Cycle Backwards Through All Windows How to Search For Sticky Notes How to Search for a Sticky Note Witih Click How to Clear the Search Bar How to Exit the Search Bar With Click How to Search for a Sticky Note With Keyboard Shortcuts How to Clear the Search Bar With Keyboard Shortcut How to Move to a Word How to Move One Word to the Left How to Move One Word to the Right How to Move to the Start of a Line How to Move to the End of a Line How to Move to the Start of a Sticky Note How to Move to the End of a Sticky Note How to Move and Delete Words How to Delete the Previous Word How to Delete the Next Word See it in action with this video:
